experience.title: AI Software Engineer
highlights: Built QueryGPT, an internal agentic application, leveraging LangChain, RAG, and ChromaDB to support natural-language SQL generation across 50K+ tables.
Developed a Playwright MCP agent that translates natural-language instructions into automated browser workflows, allowing teams to validate client configuration logic without manual test scripting.
Implemented server-side request validation using Pydantic models in FastAPI, enforcing strict schema checks and preventing malformed or malicious payloads from reaching internal services.

experience.title: Software Engineer — Code Review Go

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Implemented a quiz service in a microservices-based architecture using Go and Redis, allowing for easy scalability and maintenance.
Built a time-synced quiz overlay that dynamically tracks video position and updates questions in real-time, enhancing learning interactivity.
Integrated OpenAI Assistants API to generate questions based on video context, improving content adaptability.

experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Developed Fastrak using C# (.NET stack) to offload data acquisition from GrayKey to standard PCs, reducing GrayKey usage per phone by 85%.
Enabled simultaneous extractions, significantly improving the efficiency of a $60k tool.

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Designed and implemented an ETL Notifier System using C#, .NET, VCron, and SQL Server, reducing incident response time by 95%.
Migrated 24 margin calculation applications from Microsoft Interop to ClosedXML, cutting execution time by 50% and reducing server CPU usage by 40%.
Built an email logging system using Mailgun API and SQL Server, reducing audit lookup time by 75%.

experience.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Developed an internal tool using Microsoft Power Apps, resulting in a 75% increase in inter-departmental communication efficiency.

experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Engineered integration tests using Go, integrating with Jenkins pipeline and reducing QA time by 45%.
Integrated Google Pay API into Koho’s mobile app, driving 40% adoption among Android users and processing $2M in transactions within the first quarter.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
